Check Yo Self Markdown Grammar Checker for Blog Posts

  • Home
  • Documentation
  • Installation & Usage
  • Tutorial
  • How to Use the App

A site to check the grammar of your markdown blog posts/texts.

Frustrated by Grammarly and Hemingway apps’ inability to process markdown blog posts, I decided to make my own site to process markdown blog posts or other texts. I settled on Materialize.css, a flexible framework for Material Design Litefor the UI because I like colorful things.

Release History

  • 0.0.1
    • Work in progress
